summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jes Staley and another individual regarding an interview with a person named Story, who is planning to be in New York in August 2010. The email discusses the steps to arrange the interview and includes a confidentiality disclaimer.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as the Chief Executive Officer of J.P. Morgan, discussing the arrangement for an interview with Story.

persons.name: Story
persons.context: Story is referenced as the individual who is planning to be in New York and is to be interviewed by the head of Florida.

connections.description: Jes Staley, as the CEO of J.P. Morgan, is involved in arranging an interview with Story, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: Interview Arrangement
events.description: Plans are made for Story to be interviewed by the head of Florida while he is in New York.

keyFacts: The email discusses an upcoming interview with an individual named Story.
Jes Staley is identified as the Chief Executive Officer of J.P. Morgan.
The interview is planned to take place in New York in August 2010.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer regarding the information shared.
